text: 3:16 Taitus 2:8; Hibru 13:18; 1 Pita 2:12Ia arazir aghuibagh amua Kraisɨn gɨn zuima, me akar kuraba ia mɨgei, eghtɨ gumazir kaba ian arazir aghuibar gantɨ, da me damutɨ, me uan akar me mɨkemezibar aghumsɨzim iniam. Me kamaghɨn damusɨ, ia nɨmɨra men akaba ikarvagh, arazir aghuibar me damu. Egh ia uan araziba deravɨra da tuisɨghɨva egh arazir aghuimɨn gɨn mangɨ.
